item.title: How to Delete Docker Container Log Files
item.description: Get Docker File Location Open a terminal and run the following: :~$ docker inspect --format='{{.LogPath}}' $(docker ps -a -q) A similar result will be displayed: /var/lib/docker/containers/d7707cd1cf0e955f72958a60d7b17c79b3a812970bce3a625f6179312d09cd46/d7707cd1cf0e955f72958a60d7b17c79b3a812970bce3a625f6179312d09cd46-json.log /var/lib/docker/containers/48bd6a8d1bb4354bffbc61ab2b2b0127778d1c84453f6e6cdcb63be2d9719709/48bd6a8d1bb4354bffbc61ab2b2b0127778d1c84453f6e6cdcb63be2d9719709-json.log /var/lib/docker/containers/fb1f74d8a4ff74160876efc13601211805e692ebfb3e5e03f98a481206cfde30/fb1f74d8a4ff74160876efc13601211805e692ebfb3e5e03f98a481206cfde30-json.log /var/lib/docker/containers/d644cd46300758316c6d23fc0e60e744e0b63a2545cdef166fc66236b770d14b/d644cd46300758316c6d23fc0e60e744e0b63a2545cdef166fc66236b770d14b-json.log /var/lib/docker/containers/171ead11c41a4427b34c142808b06f4d055519025676a4154673613442cac638/171ead11c41a4427b34c142808b06f4d055519025676a4154673613442cac638-json.log Find the file path, mine is /var/lib/docker/containers/. Delete Log Files WARNING: our docker log file path should be /var/lib/docker/containers/, but if it isnâ€™t, then change it in the command below. Run: :~$ find /var/lib/docker/containers/ -type f -name "*.
